message: You have a 1 in 3 chance of getting a high-quality product from me. If you buy from me, you will have a 2/3 chance of getting a low-quality product. The price is $1000000. I'm willing to offer you a 'no questions asked' refund if you're not satisfied with the product. What do you say?
